basic.color: Flower color white, fuchsia, fruit color blue green, yellow white, red, brown, black

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value 6.5
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought,water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: No need to give extra fertilizer before fruiting
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
